Choose between different combinations of fore- and backgrounds to get your personal favorite.NOTE: Please make sure your watch is running Android Wear 5.0.* Choose between 6 languages: English, Deutsch, Español, Français, Português, עברית* Works with round and square watches* With date and battery indicators* Configuration available on the watchGraphics by: vecteezy.com (user freevector & zhaolifang)
descriptionHTML:
You are too relaxed for the exact time and you love comics?
This is YOUR watch face! Say it with fuzzy words!

A stylish background combined with cool fonts makes this watch face a remarkable enhancement for your Android smartwatch. Choose between different combinations of fore- and backgrounds to get your personal favorite.

NOTE: Please make sure your watch is running Android Wear 5.0.

* Choose between 6 languages: English, Deutsch, Español, Français, Português, עברית
* Works with round and square watches
* With date and battery indicators
* Configuration available on the watch

Graphics by: vecteezy.com (user freevector & zhaolifang)
comments: Funny... If you're looking for exact time go elsewhere, the description sets up the appropriate expectation. I love the watch face and it's comic feel
No use I have synced, uninstalled, installed, resynced. It will not show up on my moto360. I cant refund in so basically a waste of money
Very nice. Would rather have app settings on phone.
Lots of features Love it.  Lots of options for customization. Works great!
